channel.title: Multiple drops from a single NPC
channel.description: how can i set a up a monster to drop 2 or more items on death? i would like the chance of the monster dropping bones to be 100% as well as another item such as coins. i am configuring the drops in a npcdrops.cfg in a 508 server.
